channel.title: New HITMAN Game Not Canceled
channel.description:
Purportedly canceled HITMAN game actually not canceled.
[url='https://www.gamespot.com/articles/square-enix-montreal-s-next-gen-hitman-reportedly-canceled-publisher-responds-update/1100-6416951/']https://www.gamespot.com/articles/square-enix-montreal-s-next-gen-hitman-reportedly-canceled-publisher-responds-update/1100-6416951/[/url]

item.title: New HITMAN Game Not Canceled
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
So is “not cancelled” the new “announced”? Have ubiquitous leaks and rumors gotten that bad?

Read full topic

item.title: New HITMAN Game Not Canceled
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
Wonder if it’ll be worse or better than Absolution. I didn’t hate Absolution like some people but they really need to go back to the open levels instead of the linear stuff we got in Absolution (even though there were a few levels which were reminiscent of Hitman’s level design).

Read full topic
